Variable.Name: dLT
Variable.Comment: Разница между наиб. и наим. наработками компрессоров

Variable.Name: dly_SNK
Variable.Comment: Задержка запуска компрессоров при включении СНК

Variable.Name: highTime
Variable.Comment: Время задержки запроса на включение очередного компрессора

Variable.Name: Adjust
Variable.Comment: Number of seconds per hour (set 0 to indicate 3600)

Variable.Name: HoursRetain
Variable.Comment: Count of hours (updated only every HoursNo hours)

Variable.Name: Alrm
Variable.Comment: Signals that the maximum number of operating hours have been reached

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Name: Adjust
Variable.Comment: Number of seconds per hour (set 0 to indicate 3600)

Variable.Name: HoursRetain
Variable.Comment: Count of hours (updated only every HoursNo hours)

Variable.Name: Alrm
Variable.Comment: Signals that the maximum number of operating hours have been reached

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Comment: Number of seconds per hour (set 0 to indicate 3600)

Variable.Name: HoursRetain
Variable.Comment: Count of hours (updated only every HoursNo hours)

Variable.Name: Alrm
Variable.Comment: Signals that the maximum number of operating hours have been reached

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Name: lowTime
Variable.Comment: Время задержки запроса на выключение очередного компрессора

Variable.Name: mask_SNK1CntDwnShow
Variable.Comment: отображение обратного отсчета в маске для СНК1

Variable.Name: mask_SNK2CntDwnShow
Variable.Comment: отображение обратного отсчета в маске для СНК2

Variable.Name: MODE_RtLt
Variable.Comment: Режим откл. компрессоров. 0-по времени работы, 1- по наработке

Variable.Name: n_First
Variable.Comment: Флаг запуска первого счетчика после выхода из нейтральной зоны

Variable.Name: tmr_Check_Comps
Variable.Comment: Таймер проверки компрессоров каждые n секунд
